statements: DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE total_clicks > 100 AND success_rate < 0.5;
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 100 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE end_date = '2022-12-31' AND total_clicks > 1000;
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget < 5000 AND status = 'active';
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 1000 AND conversions < 100;
DELETE FROM results WHERE result_id = 10 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
